description: Information about the specimen that was extracted from the organism.
title: specimen_from_organism

genus_species.description: The scientific binomial name for the species of the biomaterial.

organ.description: The organ that the biomaterial came from. Blood and connective tissue are considered organs.
organ.comment: The term organ is very broadly defined here.

organ_part.description: A term for a specific part of the organ that the biomaterial came from.
organ_part.comment: The term organ part is very broadly defined here.

state_of_specimen.description: State of the specimen at the time of collection and how it was preserved after removal.

collection_time.description: When the biomaterial was collection, in date-time format, yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ.
